scripts.file: cd src  && cd script &&  node file.js test
scripts.reset: cd src  && cd fileDispose &&  node reset.js
scripts.create: cd src && cd fileDispose && node create.js
scripts.regularCrawler: cd src && cd laochen && cd regular && node index.js
scripts.cheerioCrawler: cd src && cd laochen && cd cheerio && node index.js
scripts.puppeteerCrawler: cd src && cd laochen && cd puppeteer && nodemon index.js
scripts.puppeteerClickCrawler: cd src && cd laochen && cd puppeteer && nodemon index_click.js
